description:
June 1, 2017 /  Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Justine Barron, as well as guest panelists Kelly Holsey and Traci Wilson-Kleekamp.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

Thank you to all of our amazing sponsors!!
